summary: Judge Priest, a proud Confederate veteran, uses common sense and considerable humanity to dispense justice in a small town in the Post-Bellum Kentucky.
cast: Will Rogers|Tom Brown|Anita Louise|Henry B. Walthall|David Landau|Rochelle Hudson|Roger Imhof|Frank Melton|Charley Grapewin|Berton Churchill|Brenda Fowler|Francis Ford|Hattie McDaniel|Stepin Fetchit|Melba Brown|Thelma Brown|Vera Brown|Grace Goodall|Winter Hall|Pat Hartigan|Si Jenks|Beulah Hall Jones|Lillian Lawrence|Duke R. Lee|Margaret Mann|Louis Mason|Paul McAllister|Matt McHugh|Paul McVey|Hyman Meyer|Robert Milasch|Frank Moran|Robert Parrish|Vester Pegg|George Reed|Constantine Romanoff|Mary Rousseau|Ernest Shields|Harry Tenbrook|Gladys Wells|Harry Wilson
title: El juez Priest
